tool.name: UPGMA
tool.description: : Order scaffold based on pseudo UPGMA method

param.name: mat
param.label: The data matrix with pair-wise statistics between markers

param.name: scaff
param.label: A tabulated file containing in col 1 : markers name, col2 : scaffold name (the file should be ordered by scaffold and marker order on scaffold)

param.name: type
param.label: The type of data. IDENT for identity statistics (ex LOD), DIF for difference statistics (ex REC)
